title: What are the similar qualities between big data and cloud computing? - Quora

response.answer_text: The two huge names of new technology trend comprises Big data and Cloud Computing. How is Big Data and Cloud Computing tied together? Big Data is the large scale of data, whereas Cloud Computing is the platform to access that data. As the name goes, Big Data is used to record large volume of information and data. Cloud Computing is the infrastructure for storing the data. Most industries now adopt both Big Data and Cloud technology as the perfect combination to yield positive outcomes. How does Big Data and Cloud Computing help? With the advancement of technology, both Big Data and Cloud Computing have contributed greatly in bringing cost-effective solutions and augmenting the total revenue of a company. At the same time, they reduce the cost of investment and generate incredible ROI. Moreover, Cloud Computing takes the responsibility of local software, and Big Data is used for decision-making in organizations.
